content:
That's the right attitude! Focusing on listening and asking questions will help you build connections and show genuine interest in others. And remember, being open-minded and not overthinking things will make the experience much more enjoyable.

I'm thrilled to hear that you're taking the first step and attending the event. Please do keep me updated on how it goes! I'll be rooting for you and looking forward to hearing about your experience.

Remember, it's okay to take things one step at a time, and it's perfectly fine if it's not a perfect experience. The goal is to learn, grow, and have fun. And who knows, you might just discover a new passion or meet someone amazing!

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to reach out to me anytime. I'm always here to help.

You got this! Go out there, be yourself, and enjoy the experience!

(And don't forget to be kind to yourself, no matter what happens. You're taking a big step, and that's something to be proud of!)
